attributes.action: Force Councils to collect all recyclable packaging materials
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Different councils have different criteria for which packaging materials they will collect. Force them to collect all materials marked as recyclable. This would put pressure on them to improve their re-cycling rates. This should be done before any further charges are allowed for rubbish collection

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
